title: Subtraction Binomial Square Formula
text: We compare our expression to the subtraction binomial square formula: $${\left(a-b\right)}^2=a^2-2a b+b^2$$.
speech: We compare our expression to the subtraction binomial square formula:  parentheses a minus b,  squared is equal to a squared minus 2 a b, plus b squared .
pacedSpeech: We compare our expression to the subtraction binomial square formula:    a minus b,  squared is equal to a squared minus 2 a b, plus b squared

title: Compare the Binomial\n
speech: parentheses a minus b,  squared \n parentheses, 8 p cubed, minus 3  squared

title: Identify a

title: Identify $$b$$

title: Plug in the Terms
text: Substitute $$a=8p^3$$ and $$b=3$$ into the subtraction binomial square formula:\n$${\left(a-b\right)}^2=a^2+2a b+b^2$$\n$${\left(8p^3-3\right)}^2={\left(8p^3\right)}^2-2\times8p^3\times3+3^2$$
speech: Substitute  a is equal to, 8 p cubed,  and  b is equal to 3  into the subtraction binomial square formula:\n, parentheses a minus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared \n parentheses, 8 p cubed, minus 3  squared is equal to parentheses 8 p cubed,  squared minus, 2 times 8 p cubed times 3 plus 3 squared
